translations.chinese: 賈人毋得衣錦繡綺縠絺紵钛，操兵，乘騎馬。
translations.english: Merchants should not wear brocade, embroidered silk, fine gauze, or thin silk, handle weapons, or ride horses.

translations.chinese: 秋八月，吏有罪未發覺者，赦之。
translations.english: In the eighth month of autumn, officials with crimes not yet discovered were pardoned.

translations.chinese: 九月，行自雒陽至，淮南王、梁王、趙王、楚王皆從。
translations.english: In the ninth month, he traveled from Luoyang to arrive. The King of Huainan, King of Liang, King of Zhao, King of Chu all followed.

translations.chinese: 九年冬十月，淮南王、梁王、趙王、楚王朝未央宮，置酒前殿。
translations.english: In the tenth month of winter in the ninth year, the King of Huainan, King of Liang, King of Zhao, King of Chu paid court at the Weiyang Palace. A banquet was held in the front hall.

translations.chinese: 上奉玉卮為太上皇壽，曰：「始大人常以臣亡賴，不能治產業，不如仲力。
translations.english: The emperor held a jade goblet to toast the Taishang Huang, saying: "At first, father often said that I was worthless and could not manage property, unlike brother Zhong in strength.
